backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, OTP handling, and registration storage with access control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for three registration-flow features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of all major frontend files in the registration and admin flows.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color tokens, light/dark themes, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app switching between splash screen, registration flow, and admin panel with flow reset logic.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen with reduced-motion support, company branding, skip button, and auto-dismiss timing.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Full admin interface handling authentication, role checks, admin claiming, registrations listing, and edit mode UI.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: UI card for entering and applying an admin setup code, showing loading, success, and error states.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/E: Form for editing registration fields with validation, read‑only metadata, and save/cancel handling.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: React Query hooks for admin status, roles, registrations, and update operations with cache invalidation.
Mutation hook to apply an admin setup code, reinitialize the actor, and refresh admin‑related queries.
frontend/src/features/registration/compo: Error boundary displaying a recovery UI if a registration step throws an error.
frontend/src/features/registration/hooks: Mutation hooks for OTP generation/verification and submitting registration data with file handling.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Controls multi‑step customer registration flow with validation, navigation, and state for each step.
frontend/src/features/registration/steps: Form step collecting customer personal details with validation and change notifications.
Handles phone-based OTP generation, verification, and final registration submission.
Displays terms, tracks acceptance, and generates printable proof with timestamp.
Manages Aadhaar, PAN, and optional payment receipt uploads with previews and validation.
frontend/src/features/registration/terms: Static list of router and service-related terms and conditions.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Type definitions for customer details, document data, and step props.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Validation logic for customer details including phone, DOB, email, and address.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, dark mode rules, print styles, and splash screen background/animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, containers, animations, and registering plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current feature set, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the build.
